name: 'Time Stood Still on the Playground' (AV, endless looping, genuine analogue CRT shit)
description: Endlessly looping analogue video art, run through 2 Edirol V4 videomixers, a hardware glitch module, sent to a CRT and recorded on camera. Follow me on Twitter: @LotteZ13 Website: www.lottez.com Instagram.com/LotteZproductions.
